nodes.text: The  SAGroup was a sub-branch and youth program of the Commission for the Protection of the Republic (COMPOR). Venthan Chassu, a member of SAGroup and supporter of Supreme Chancellor Sheev Palpatine, created the propaganda poster Do Not Bind His Hands.

In the aftermath of the Galactic Republic's reformation as the Galactic Empire, COMPOR was reorganized into the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order (COMPNOR). Like its predecessor, COMPNOR had a youth program—the Sub-Adult Group, also known as SAGroup.
